Far North’s Got Talent back to showcase district’s top young performers https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/far-norths-got-talent-back-to-showcase-districts-top-young-performers/QUFKSPRX7NGXVOXU46KWT5QGTE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/far-norths-got-talent-back-to-showcase-districts-top-young-performers/QUFKSPRX7NGXVOXU46KWT5QGTE/ Mike DinsdaleBest of youth talent to take part in Far North’s Got Talent contest. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Kapowairua Waitai won the junior section when Far North’s Got Talent was held in 2017. That win gave her the confidence to continue and earlier this year she performed on the Aotearoa Stage at One Love Concert. The talent quest is on again and the call has gone out for people keen to take part.
